roleset.name: like a lot, place much value in
roleset.note: CHERISH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cherish' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.2. (from cherish.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: Yet under Mr. Reagan's preferred successor, President Bush, those two cherished national-security causes are withering on the vine.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: In this kind of unfair situation , an upstanding man should cherish and respect women all the more .
example.arg: In this kind of unfair situation
